md:
giải nghĩa từ "assembling" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Assembling (verb) - lắp ráp, lắp ghép
	* Meaning: to put together the parts of something, such as a machine or a piece of furniture, so that it is complete and can be used.
	* Example: "The workers spent all day assembling the new machinery."
	* Related words: assembly, assemble, disassemble, reassemble

2. Assembling (noun) - lắp ráp, lắp ghép
	* Meaning: the act of putting together the parts of something, such as a machine or a piece of furniture.
	* Example: "The assembling of the new bike took several hours."
	* Related words: assembly, assemble, disassembly, reassembly
html:
giải nghĩa từ "assembling" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  1. Assembling (verb) - lắp ráp, lắp ghép

    • Meaning: to put together the parts of something, such as a machine or a piece of furniture, so that it is complete and can be used.
    • Example: "The workers spent all day assembling the new machinery."
    • Related words: assembly, assemble, disassemble, reassemble

  2. Assembling (noun) - lắp ráp, lắp ghép

    • Meaning: the act of putting together the parts of something, such as a machine or a piece of furniture.
    • Example: "The assembling of the new bike took several hours."
    • Related words: assembly, assemble, disassembly, reassembly
